channel.title: Karen Boers on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Karen Boers on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Startups.be the one stop shop for Belgian startups looking for support
item.description: If you follow me on Twitter or any other social media account, I’m one of the founders and board members of Startups.be. It is an initiative I’ve been involved in for over a year, but only recently have we created the non profit organization. (Yes, I know it is hard to follow up on all the things I do, but you can always check my LinkedIn to have an idea.
